item.title: getLinks
item.description: La m√©thode getLinks : def getLinks(articleUrl): html = urlopen('http://en.wikipedia.org{}'.format(articleUrl)) bs = BeautifulSoup(html, 'html.parser') return bs.find('div', {'id': 'bodyContent'}).find_all('a', href=re.compile('^(/wiki/)((?!:).)*$'))
